Interface AdapterVMI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdapterVMConnector, AdapterVMInboundPort, AdapterVMOutboundPort, ApplicationVMAdaptable, ApplicationVMcoordinate

    public interface AdapterVMI
    Version:
    06.01.2018 This interface AdapterVMI allows allocating cores to the AVM
    Author:
    Hacene KASDI
